messages: a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (11:37): So I went out and ordered alcoholic drinks last night. I didn't even get ID'd.
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:38): do you look old enough?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:42): not really :p
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (11:50): He doesn't really look old enough to be out without his mother
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:50): well, at a dinner at TPAC in Boston, MikeSmith was ID'd (and denied alcoholic beverage) and I was not ID'd
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (11:52): yay, now i can remove img { border:0 } from my style sheets
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:52): but Mike has a mustache
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:52): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: I had a collar on my shirt :-)
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:54): plinss had a collar, too, and was not ID'd. IIRC, everyone wearing t-shirts was ID'd regardless of facial hair
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:55): interesting
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:55): though Mike was telling me they also do
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:55): and then the waiter refused to accept Mike's Japanese alien card as ID
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:56): euh oops; anyway, that was supposed to end in US airport trouble
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:56): MikeSmith looks way too old to ID
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:56): even I look too old to ID these days
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:56): ah yeah, I was on that table I think
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:57): I was getting ID'd regularly as recently as 2 years ago and I was 32 then
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:57): but you seem to have a much better memory of it :)
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (11:57): I can't remember how old I am any more
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (11:57): has wine at TPAC in Mandelieu
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (11:57): *had
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (11:57): Apparently the age in France has been raised to 18
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:57): I went into a bar once in Palo Alto where I wasn't ID'd but chaals was
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (11:57): hah
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:57): and I was under 21 at the time :p
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (11:58): You're assuming they want to catch you
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:58): (of course, the fully story is that the bouncer was in the restroom while I entered)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:58): s/fully/full/
040342c014ffc1c11592948bd92e3721 (11:59): it's a compliment if you're getting ID-ed at 40 ;)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (12:00): I'm not sure chaals would find it a compliment as he isn't 40 yet (afaik) :)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (12:03): 8 days until a new Ubuntu comes out
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (12:03): somewhat excited about this release
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (12:04): I am considering installing it early just so I can change the theme as fast as possible
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (12:05): (the buttons-on-the-left thing I can probably cope with, but srsly, what's with the dark grey)
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (12:06): Even the guy who b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea calls emo dislikes the darkness of the theme.
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (12:18): I thought the default theme was supposed to be Light
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (12:20): do Qt apps still look totally different on Lucid?
8087bc373ccc56ba1e3d350849874c5b (12:22): should I escape & to &amp; in links in HTML5?
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (12:24): you  don't have to in most cases, though
8087bc373ccc56ba1e3d350849874c5b (12:25): why and when should I
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (12:25): always, so you don't accidentally fail to escape when it's required
8087bc373ccc56ba1e3d350849874c5b (12:26): when is it required then
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (12:26): per the latest spec, it's only required if the & is followed by something that matches an entity name
8087bc373ccc56ba1e3d350849874c5b (12:27): ok, and I won't remember all of those, so yes then I'll escape it all the time
